      static boolean appointmentConflictExists​(int x, int y, java.time.LocalDateTime s, java.time.LocalDateTime e)
      This method queries the database for conflicting Customer Appointments to validate there are no overlaps for a specified Customer when the user attempts to Add or Modify an Appointment Start and End time.

      This method Inserts a new Appointment into the database.

      This method grabs all the Start and End Time values that can be select when Adding or Modifying an Appointment for use in UI ComboBoxes.

      This method populates the Months Dictionary with the (key,value) pair (key=monthName,value=monthNumber)-This associates the selected Month Names from the UI ComboBoxes with the respective Number.

      This method grabs all the Title values that can be select when Adding or Modifying an Appointment for use in UI ComboBoxes.

      • loadMonthsDictionary

        public static void loadMonthsDictionary()
        This method populates the Months Dictionary with the (key,value) pair (key=monthName,value=monthNumber)-This associates the selected Month Names from the UI ComboBoxes with the respective Number. Invoked in Main.

      • loadTitles

        public static void loadTitles()
        This method grabs all the Title values that can be select when Adding or Modifying an Appointment for use in UI ComboBoxes. Invoked in Main.

        This method grabs all the Type values that can be select when Adding or Modifying an Appointment for use in UI ComboBoxes. Invoked in Main.

      • checkUpcomingAppointment

        public static Appointment checkUpcomingAppointment()
                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method grabs all upcoming Appointments from the database scheduled to start within 15 minutes of valid User login.
        Returns:
        Returns all upcoming Appointments within the range
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • appointmentConflictExists

        public static boolean appointmentConflictExists​(int x,
                                                int y,
                                                java.time.LocalDateTime s,
                                                java.time.LocalDateTime e)
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method queries the database for conflicting Customer Appointments to validate there are no overlaps for a specified Customer when the user attempts to Add or Modify an Appointment Start and End time.
        Parameters:
        x - Customer_ID
        y - Appointment_ID
        s - Start
        e - End
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
                                                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method grabs all the Appointments currently scheduled in the database for populating UI TableView.
        Returns:
        Returns all appointments
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getAppointmentTypes

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getAppointmentTypes()
                                                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method is invoked to populate UI ComboBox with Type values existing in the database for the AppointmentTypeReport.

        Returns list of Types

      • getAppointmentTypeCountByMonth

        public static int getAppointmentTypeCountByMonth​(java.lang.String type,
                                                 java.lang.String month)
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method queries the database for specific Appointment Types for a specified month.
        Parameters:
        type - Specified Appointment Type
        month - Specified Month
        Returns:
        Returns the total count found
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • insertAppointment

        public static void insertAppointment​(java.lang.String title,
                                     java.lang.String description,
                                     java.lang.String location,
                                     java.lang.String type,
                                     java.sql.Timestamp start,
                                     java.sql.Timestamp end,
                                     int customerId,
                                     int userId,
                                     int contactId)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method Inserts a new Appointment into the database. The Appointment_ID value is auto-generated upon Insertion.
        Parameters:
        title - Title
        description - Description
        location - Location
        type - Type
        start - Start
        end - End
        customerId - Customer_ID
        userId - User_ID
        contactId - Contact_ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getPieChartData

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<javafx.scene.chart.PieChart.Data> getPieChartData()
                                                                                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        LAMBDA - This method generates the Pie Chart Data for Software type Appointments by Office Location for the third report. This method includes a for each lambda for looping/filtering Appointment types to find the Software type which is set as the SQL query's search parameter. Lambdas are also used to get the aggregate stream.filter.count() which calculates the number of appointments for each location.
        Returns:
        Returns data values to populate the pie chart
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
